name: distinct_point_count
description: Count of distinct individual messages that are involved in this track.

name: seg_geography
description: MULTIPOINT containing all the latitude and longitude coordinates of this track.

name: times
description: Array containing all the timestamps on each individual point in this track.

name: scores
description: Array containing all the fishing scores of the messages in this track.

name: speeds
description: Array containing all the speeds of the messages in this track.

name: courses
description: Array containing all the courses of the messages in this track.
